item.description:
Hey guys! I'm helping out my friend, Nina, promote some AWESOME new artists.  I've hosted a MeetUp before to see Sarah Borrello! She's BACK and with additional artists! Please join us this coming Saturday for some great music.  We should all be able to meet at the door just prior to 9pm. Please see info below regarding the bands, costs, tickets, etc.  Thanks! -Isabel

===================================================

Conquer showcase at Hard Rock! Hey Guy, Sarah Borrello, Carmen, Solo Saloon! 
Live music - from Americana to Rock!

Save $! Pre-purchase tickets by 5/23 - links by band are below. 
Friends,
This is our first Conquer Entertainment showcase at Hard Rock Cafe, Boston & we've lined up terrific talent - Hey Guy, Sarah Borrello, Carmen, & Solo Saloon! Thank you for supporting independent artists! I look forward to seeing you there! You'll see alot of familiar faces and it'll be a fun night! Show starts at 9 & some will be gathering at the front bar earlier!
*** Pick who you want to support and pre-purchase tickets please! I have to promote the team of course (1st two below) but they're all great!
Ticket links by band are below.

***Pre-sale $ credits to specific artist/band! Links below! Tickets: $10 Pre-Sale*; $15 at door
Portion of proceeds donated to musicdrivesus.org

HEY GUY
Modern rock band I sponsored that puts on an incredible, fun show!
From NYC! Some of the band has roots at Berklee!
*** Ticket link for Hey Guy: http://ceshowcasemay26boston-HeyGuy.eventbrite.com/

SARAH BORRELLO
Blues alternative powerhouse brought to our team by Mia Boostrom!
*** Ticket link for Sarah: http://ceshowcasemay26boston-SarahBorrello.eventbrite.com/

Say NINA and ISABEL sent you at the door and we'll connect there!

FOUR Great Bands!!

ADDRESS: Hard Rock Cafe, Boston; 24 Clinton St
TICKETS: please buy ahead! Links above!
**Pre-sale $ credits to specific artist/band!
DATE/TIME: Sat, May 26, 2012 at 9:00 PM - 1:00 AM

Thanks!
Nina Pickell, Managing Director, Beyond Intent
Certified Artist Developer & CAD Recruiter / Team Lead
Conquer Entertainment
Phone/Text: 617-513-9631

===============================================================

The Boston Hard Rock Cafe is conveniently located at Faneuil Hall in the Haymarket.  It's very near Haymarket (Green and Orange Lines), Government Center (Blue and Green Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red Line).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN YOUR OWN SEPARATE TAB. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out info on where to meet on the day of event.
item.name: Conquer Entertainment LIVE MUSIC Showcase at the Hard Rock Cafe
